Key terms

critical thinking 
5 keys of critical thinking 
    1.challange assumption 
    2.consider alternatives 
    3.evaluate data 
    4.identify key drivers 
    5.understand context 

Types of cyber attacks and their impact


tols and attacks
1. seadaddy and seaduke (cyber bear US Election  )
2.BlackEnergy 3.0 (Russion hackers )
3. shamoon (iron hackers )
4.Duqu and Flame (Olimpis game US and israel )
5. Darkseoul (Lazarous and North koria )
6. wannacry (Lazarous and North koria )

Types of attacks 
    active attack 
    passive attack 


Security mechanish 
1. specific scurity mechanish 
cryptography 
access control 
digital signature 
data intrigrity 
authentication exchange 
traffic padding 
routing control 
notarization 

2.persavive security mechanish 
trusted facility 
security label 
event dectection

security recovery
